snippet: Readers respond to an Op-Ed article by Aaron B. O’Connell, the author of a book about the Marine Corps.
abstract: Letter from Walter L Cutler, former United States ambassador, responds to Nov 5 Aaron B O'Connell Op-Ed column warning about America's militarization-industrial complex.
lead_paragraph: Readers respond to an Op-Ed article by Aaron B. O’Connell, the author of a book about the Marine Corps.

headline.main: The Role of the Military in Our Society
headline.print_headline: The Role of the Military in Our Society

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
